ygData.subject: RE: About Lizardmen Crusaders...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well after trying myself to find one of the guys for over an hour, I called in my ranger friend who was able to locate 1 on tracking.. We proceeded to the
ygData.messageBody:
Well after trying myself to find one of the guys for over an hour, I called
in my ranger friend who was able to locate 1 on tracking.. We proceeded to
the Temple and killed it, didn't drop anything. So for the next 3 hours we
ran around Cazic trying to locate more of the damn things with no luck.. The
Ranger saw one more appear on tracking but dissappeared before he could find
it. If they are going to make this a rare spawn how about at least making
sure that it drops the pieces everytime.. And here I was thinking that this
would eliminate camping..(Plus the fact I hate Cazic, still a mad house in
there)..

Oh and here is something you always want to see, Wizard shouting across the
zone "What is this Decayed armor I picked up for??"

Enjoy..



-----Original Message-----
From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 9:39 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] About Lizardmen Crusaders...


From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>

Crusaders are actually pretty tough. They do Harm
Touch and its darn good one too. And the y hit for 80s
They were blue to me at 37.
I have had a horrible time finding them.
One person said his group killed about a dozen of them
in a 6 hour period at the Archon temple. I have been
at that same spot for a lot longer, and ive seen 3.
First dropped a left vambrace. Then the next day, one
dropped nothing, a few hours later another dropped a
bracer.
Thats it.

Which leads to my question. Has anyone figured out a
spawn place/time for the crusaders?

I have also heeard one spawns in the UTR.

Still no sign of the cavalier.

There is more camping time now than with rubi.
Oh well

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Shanti Ashtangi <zealpath@...> wrote:
> So, what level are they, and how hard are they to
> find within Cazic-Thule?
> Good thing about the mistmoore faction BTW, although
> I'd still like to get
> it up in case one of the inhabitants ends up being
> the key to an sk sword
> etc...
>
>
>
